awd_titl_txt: Small Grant for Exploratory Research: Multicomponent        Extractive Crystallization
awd_abstract_narration: This project under the Small Grants for Exploratory Research                    Program examines multicomponent extractive crystallization for                  systems with simple eutectic.  General separation schemes                       involving crystallizer and filters are developed based on                       detailed knowledge of phase diagrams at various temperatures.                   The goal is to avoid eutectic and produce pure products.  The                   separation schemes are tested experimentally with solutions of                  m-, o-, and p-xylenes, or adipic, glutaric, and succinic                        acids.  The results are applicable to separating and purifying                  products of several chemical and pharmaceutical industries.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
